foods.name: Greek salad

foods.description: A refreshing and nutritious dish often made from natural ingredients like greens and fruits.

foods.name: Lasagna Rolls
foods.description: A unique version of the Italian dish Lasagna, but prepared in small rolls and shaped like sushi. This is a popular and delicious dish, often made for parties, families, or to enjoy on special occasions.

foods.name: Peri Peri Rolls
foods.description: A dish of African origin, especially popular in South Africa and Mozambique. This dish is famous for its spicy and attractive flavor, usually made from grilled chicken or lamb, rolled in bread or dumplings, and covered with the region's signature peri peri sauce.

foods.name: Chicken Rolls
foods.description: Is a popular dish made from chicken, usually grilled or ground chicken, rolled in bread or dumplings and can be grilled or deep-fried. This is a versatile dish with many different versions around the world.

foods.name: Veg Rolls
foods.description: Is a popular vegetarian dish, often made from vegetables and other plant ingredients. This is a light and nutritious option, suitable for those who prefer a vegetarian diet or want to lose weight.

foods.name: Ripple Ice Cream
foods.description: It is a special type of ice cream with a different flavor and quality compared to regular ice cream. This is a remarkable ice cream product thanks to the unique combination of cream and colored stripes, creating prominent stripes on the ice cream. Each strip of chocolate or different fruit flavors creates a rich flavor and color of the ice cream.

foods.name: Fruit Ice Cream
foods.description: A great dessert, combining the natural flavors of fresh fruits with the smoothness of high-quality ice cream.

foods.name: Jar Ice Cream
foods.description: A special dessert, combining the natural flavors of fresh fruits with the smoothness of high-quality ice cream, served in cute little jars.

foods.name: Vanilla Ice Cream
foods.description: A classic dessert, combining the delicious flavor of vanilla with the smoothness of high-quality ice cream. This dish is always the perfect choice for those who love simple but charming flavors.

foods.name: Chicken Sandwich
foods.description: It is the perfect combination of delicious chicken, fresh green vegetables and soft bread. This is an ideal choice for a dynamic and nutritious mid-day meal.

foods.name: Butterscotch Cake

foods.name: Somen Noodles
foods.description: A thin, white Japanese noodle dish, often marinated in water to make the noodles soft and easy to digest. Often used in Japanese soups or salads.

foods.name: Cooked Noodles
foods.description: A dish of cooked, soft and attractive noodles, often used in many Asian and international dishes. This dish is often served hot or cold, with a variety of sauces and other foods.
